name: Gothitelle
author: kirisAki
flavor_text: Starry skies thousands of light-years away are visible in the space distorted by their intense psychic power.

abilities.name: Teleport Room
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard any Stadium card in play. If you do, put a Stadium card with a different name from your discard pile into play.

attacks.name: Psy Report
attacks.effect: Your opponent reveals his or her hand.
